title: Chintz fragments
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants (black, 3 reds, 2 purples) applied by brush, sometimes over resist. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist (chintz).
description: Four fragments of a large design of flowering branches on a white ground.
